front.title: I2NSF Network Security Function-Facing Interface YANG Data Model

author.organization: Department of Electronic, Electrical and Computer Engineering
Department of Computer Science and Engineering

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for configuring security policy rules on Network Security Functions (NSF) in the Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF) framework. The YANG data model in this document corresponds to the data model in Capability data model in the I2NSF framework [I-D.ietf-i2nsf-capability-data-model].
